definition: special/unique/distinguished/especially/unusual/very/abbr. for 特克斯[te4 ke4 si1], tex
to rein in/to compel/to force/to carve/to engrave/(literary) to command/to lead/bridle/(physics) abbr. for 勒克斯[le4 ke4 si1], lux

sentences.english: Hitlers come and go, but Germany and the German people remain.
sentences.chinese: 希特勒來了又走，德意志與德國人民長存。

sentences.english: In Hitler's entourage this drawing was regarded as blasphemous.
sentences.chinese: 希特勒周圍的人把我這幅畫看作是侮漫不敬。

sentences.english: Hitler's just a self-educated street agitator.
sentences.chinese: 希特勒無非是個自學出身的街頭煽動家罷了。

sentences.english: Hess was one of Hitler's closest aides.
sentences.chinese: 赫斯曾是希特勒最親近的助手之一。

sentences.english: Hitler's undisguised effort to persecute the Jews met with worldwide condemnation.
sentences.chinese: 希特勒對猶太人的露骨迫害行爲受到全世界的譴責。

sentences.english: The Axis alliance with Japan in the East.
sentences.chinese: 希特勒在東部與日本結成軸心國聯盟。

sentences.english: Even Hitler's birthday picture has a penciled X through it.
sentences.chinese: 即使是希特勒的生日圖片支持X通過它一鉛筆。

sentences.english: He acted with forBearance toward the hecklers.
sentences.chinese: 他在劇中扮演希特勒一角。

sentences.english: Paradoxically, Italy needed the war of Hitlerite nazism.
sentences.chinese: 荒謬的是，意大利求助於希特勒納粹主義的戰爭。

sentences.english: Within a year Hitler's empire, which he had boasted would last a thousand years, lay in ruins.
sentences.chinese: 不到一年，希特勒自吹能延續千年的帝國便崩潰了。
你是希特勒單相思的情人。

sentences.english: He committed suicide when the collapse of the Third Reich was imminent (1945).
sentences.chinese: 1945年德意志第三帝國垮臺時，希特勒飲彈自盡。

sentences.english: Hitler's invasion of Russia is no more than a prelude to an attempted invasion of the British Isles.
sentences.chinese: 希特勒侵略俄國不過是企圖侵略不列顛諸島的前奏。

sentences.english: Adolf Hitler's massive gamble in the West had failed miserably .
sentences.chinese: 阿道夫希特勒在西線的重大賭博不行失敗了。

sentences.english: Hitler's ambition was falsified at last.
sentences.chinese: 希特勒的野心最終未能得逞。

sentences.english: One of the paintings appears to be Hitler's self-portrait.
sentences.chinese: 其中一幅被疑是希特勒的自畫像。

definition: Benito Mussolini (1883-1945), Italian fascist dictator, "Il Duce", president 1922-1943
Joseph Goebbels (1897-1945), German Nazi leader and politician
variant of 邱吉爾|邱吉尔[Qiu1 ji2 er3]
Hirohito, personal name of the Shōwa 昭和[Zhao1 he2] emperor of Japan (1901-1989), reigned 1925-1989
Dwight D. Eisenhower (1890-1969), US army general and politician, Supreme Allied Commander in Europe during World War II, US President 1953-1961
variant of 拿破崙|拿破仑[Na2 po4 lun2]
